name: Cloudsoft Mobile Inc.
description:
Cloudsoft Mobile Inc. is a leading digital product agency specializing in mobile, web and IoT development. 
Since 2013 our team of award-winning mobile strategists, UX/UI designers, and software engineers have delivered mobile and web solutions to startups and some of the world's leading enterprise and consumer-facing companies, including: Verizon, The Sports Authority, Georg Fischer and BBVA Compass.
